mapper.update: update s_b_call_main set call_remark = #{callRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_code = #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_time = #{maxTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, call_status = #{callStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_time = #{resultTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, result_detail = #{resultDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, sys_code, call_remark, template_code, max_time, call_status, result_time, result_detail, create_time, modify_time from s_b_call_main
